quote: When I feel tired, I just think about how great I will feel once I finally reach my goal.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: You have to think about it before you can do it. The mind is what makes it all possible.
author: Kai Greene

quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn’t happen.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.
author: LeBron James

quote: You should never stay at the same level. Always push yourself to the next.
author: Marnelli Dimzon

quote: You did not wake up today to be mediocre.
author: Robin Arzon

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you.
author: Fred DeVito

quote: You can either suffer the pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: We can push ourselves further. We always have more to give.
author: Simone Biles

quote: If you want to be the best, you have to do things other people aren’t willing to do.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: Every champion was once a contender who refused to give up.
author: Rocky Balboa

quote: The difference between try and triumph is a little ‘umph’.
author: Marvin Phillips

quote: If you are not pissed off for greatness, that just means you’re okay with being mediocre.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: Keep working even when no one is watching.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: Your health account, your bank account, they’re the same thing. The more you put in, the more you can take out. Exercise is king and nutrition is queen. Together you have a kingdom.
author: Jack LaLanne

quote: Don’t dream of winning. Train for it!
author: Mo Farah

quote: Most people give up right before the big break comes, don’t let that person be you.
author: Michael Boyle

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: Exercise should be regarded as a tribute to the heart.
author: Gene Tunney

quote: Keep listening to your body. It will tell you when something is not okay.
author: Emily Infeld

quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t, you are right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Great things come from hard work and perseverance. No excuses.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
author: Arnold Palmer

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Your mind will quit a thousand times before your body will.
author: Reginald Red

quote: I’ve grown most not from victories, but setbacks. If winning is God’s reward, then losing is how he teaches us.
author: Serena Williams

quote: Set your goals high, and don’t stop until you get there.
author: Bo Jackson
